channel.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
channel.description:
Hello and welcome to Ardour, we are hoping to be one of the leading Runescape 2006 Remakes. I am aware that most of you are bored of remakes and there are alot of them but you haven't seen ardour. We encourage professionalism in everything we do and only hire the best and most suited staff members. We aim to bring the most memorable times back.
[u][b]Ardour economy:[/b][/u]
This basically means there's no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, trading with other players, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we're not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.
[u][b]The Ardour Experience:[/b][/u]
We want to make Ardours community like no other! We would like to see an active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Ardour, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.
Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many endless activities and has a yell function so you can get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek hosted by a staff member.
[u][b]The Ardour staff team:[/b][/u]
All of Ardour staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These applications then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from different time zones to up the chance of one being online at all times. We make sure we have the nicest, most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience giving you professional support and help when ever you need it.
[u][b]Ardour Development & Progress:[/b][/u]
The development team here at Ardour knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Ardour community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with content polls that you can vote on to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. Alternatively you can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.
[u][b]Ardour Forums:[/b][/u]
We would like the forums to be active with people posting their activities whether it be banter ranging from the PVM section to our clan discussion to even the market place, we want you to notice an uncontrollable amount of topics and giveaways which no other RSPS can provide you. Here at Ardour we would like to be successful in the amount of members we have and will plan to still be growing at a rapid and uncontrollable pace. We also have a dedicated black market section, you will eventually be able to buy Ardour Prem which will simply give you the status and the money earned will all go into the server.
Features: - Flawless skills - Perfect Duel Arena - Many Minigames perfected - Clue scrolls implemented - Friendly Staff and Active staff from all over the world - Hundreds of PVM and PVP opportunities with countless rewards - Every city functioning - Perfect PKing with flawless switching and perfect hybriding - Extremely stable - Every working special attack you can think of from Runescape in 2006.
We will be a 100% replica of Runescape as it was in 2006. Please join us in our growing community.
[size=18pt][b]If you think you have the skills required to help program ardour, please add my skype[/b][/size]: [size=24pt]mrzeus6[/size]
[IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/tut_zps4d288db4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/ardour3_zpsafbd120f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i429.photobucket.com/albums/qq20/nathanz1_2008/ardour2_zps18b39846.png[/img]

item.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

[quote=“firstchoice8, post:20, topic:539942”][quote author=nathanz link=topic=658792.msg4408107#msg4408107 date=1392663459]

another remake? Why?
Could you try something more unique please.
[/quote]?

What’s more unique than a remake which won’t close and have immature staff?

Anything, theres so much remakes out there that it’s not considered “unique” anymore. Unique is when you make a one of a kind server, or at least add ideas that have never been seen before. With that being said, there’s no way to fully remake something and make it unique, to make it unique you’d have to change up some stuff or add ideas of your own.

Btw, don’t get the wrong message, I’m not saying this server will fail and it may grow big, it may not but my point is, no matter how you look at it, a remake of anything can’t be unique unless you add your own ideas.[/quote][quote=“furyking50, post:19, topic:539942”]Just hope this server doesn’t have awhole bunch of resets like Project Fnatic did.

GL![/quote]

Thank you both for your comments, i respect your opinions. I hope Ardour can grow into a large community. There will be no server resets.

Read full topic
item.source: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006

item.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @firstchoice8 firstchoice8
item.description:
@firstchoice8 wrote:

[quote=“nathanz, post:18, topic:539942”][quote author=CoderOops link=topic=658792.msg4408094#msg4408094 date=1392659302]
another remake? Why?
Could you try something more unique please.
[/quote]?

What’s more unique than a remake which won’t close and have immature staff? :)[/quote]

Anything, theres so much remakes out there that it’s not considered “unique” anymore. Unique is when you make a one of a kind server, or at least add ideas that have never been seen before. With that being said, there’s no way to fully remake something and make it unique, to make it unique you’d have to change up some stuff or add ideas of your own.

Btw, don’t get the wrong message, I’m not saying this server will fail and it may grow big, it may not but my point is, no matter how you look at it, a remake of anything can’t be unique unless you add your own ideas.

Read full topic

item.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

[quote=“xEthanx, post:15, topic:539942”]First of all, why isn’t this in Server Advertisements? Is it not released yet and you’re just looking for feedback or something?

I am aware that most of you are bored of remakes and there are alot of them but you haven’t seen ardour.

I hate to break it to you, but a simple one line disclaimer at the beginning of your post isn’t going to solve this. You’re right, most of us are bored of remakes, probably because it seems like every week there’s a new post here about it. What about your server will separate it from the others? It’s not like you can really have the freedom to be unique in a remake.

We encourage professionalism in everything we do and only hire the best and most suited staff members. We aim to bring the most memorable times back.

I have probably seen this a million different times with slightly different semantics. That’s meaningless now. You along with tons of other people are aiming to bring the memorable times back. In fact, Jagex has already done that, you just have to pay for a membership (which is worth it in my opinion, because going with a remake at this point is pretty risky. It’s only a matter of time before Jagex takes down all of these remakes for legal issues.)

If your server even makes it to this summer, which I’m sad to say it probably won’t, it still won’t be anything we all haven’t seen before. I hate to be mean but it’s necessary to be blunt. I would advise you to spend your time with something else at this point, but of course that’s your decision. Nonetheless, good luck.[/quote]

It isn’t released yet, it is going into testing in a few days. Thank you for your feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @xEthanx xEthanx
item.description:
@xEthanx wrote:

First of all, why isn’t this in Server Advertisements? Is it not released yet and you’re just looking for feedback or something?

nathanz:

I am aware that most of you are bored of remakes and there are alot of them but you haven’t seen ardour.

I hate to break it to you, but a simple one line disclaimer at the beginning of your post isn’t going to solve this. You’re right, most of us are bored of remakes, probably because it seems like every week there’s a new post here about it. What about your server will separate it from the others? It’s not like you can really have the freedom to be unique in a remake.

nathanz:

We encourage professionalism in everything we do and only hire the best and most suited staff members. We aim to bring the most memorable times back.

I have probably seen this a million different times with slightly different semantics. That’s meaningless now. You along with tons of other people are aiming to bring the memorable times back. In fact, Jagex has already done that, you just have to pay for a membership (which is worth it in my opinion, because going with a remake at this point is pretty risky. It’s only a matter of time before Jagex takes down all of these remakes for legal issues.)

If your server even makes it to this summer, which I’m sad to say it probably won’t, it still won’t be anything we all haven’t seen before. I hate to be mean but it’s necessary to be blunt. I would advise you to spend your time with something else at this point, but of course that’s your decision. Nonetheless, good luck.

Read full topic

@nathanz wrote:

This was the 2006scape base when it first got released riddled with bugs, I fixed it up and released as “project fnatic” V.1.0 Then fixed and released again as “Fnatic”. It has been my own for a while, this time when i release i plan on making it flawless.

item.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

[quote=“firstchoice8, post:2, topic:539942”]I feel the reason people are bored with remakes isn’t because theres a lot and them not being “professional”, I’m not speaking for everyone but personally I just find 2006 remakes and any oldschool remakes to build up a lot of hype which is why they get so much success at the start then die down (including oldschool runescape). Reason I get excited is because nostalgia, reason I leave is I realize the same rs community isn’t there where everyone was friends basically and the content is really outdated.

Anyway good luck with this. :)[/quote]

I’m not interested in creating ‘hype’ at this time, i’m simply just trying to get us out there. When we have earned the right to create hype is when i will do so. I guess i’m trying to say actions speak louder than words huh.

Anyway good luck with this.

item.title: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

Hello and welcome to Ardour, we are hoping to be one of the leading Runescape 2006 Remakes. I am aware that most of you are bored of remakes and there are alot of them but you haven’t seen ardour. We encourage professionalism in everything we do and only hire the best and most suited staff members. We aim to bring the most memorable times back.

Ardour economy:

This basically means there’s no spawning and any items people obtain will have been earned through PVM or from PKing. This means our items will have value, making everything more fun, giving players something to aim for and of course making it so much better when you finally get that kill for rare items. There are tons of different ways to exchange your items including specific market areas, trading with other players, and even a dedicated section on forums. Being a new server we want to get our economy right the first time. To ensure we achieve this we have made drop rates at a perfect level to maintain item drops for PvMers, but also to give just enough that we’re not flooded with items and massive inflation like you see on most other private servers.

The Ardour Experience:

We want to make Ardours community like no other! We would like to see an active wilderness, active forums, and active PvMing and Clanning communities. Here at Ardour, we don’t like to mess around, we want to bring you the players the best possible experience that we can give you.

Our community gives a warm welcome to all new players, and presents them with many endless activities and has a yell function so you can get to know existing members. We have many events and tournaments in and out of the wilderness that makes this possible. These can be anything from Clan based PKing, to a simple games of Hide and Seek hosted by a staff member.

The Ardour staff team:

All of Ardour staff are hand-picked based off applications anyone is free to submit. These applications then get voted on by our staff team and those few that provide the best application will get a chance to prove them selves by starting as a Server Support member. Not only do we make sure we have staff from different time zones to up the chance of one being online at all times. We make sure we have the nicest, most helpful staff available for you. Many of our staff all have previous experience giving you professional support and help when ever you need it.

Ardour Development & Progress:

The development team here at Ardour knows quality updates have to come from what the community wants. Once you’ve become a part of the spectacular Ardour community, you’ll notice weekly updates, with content polls that you can vote on to bring what you want and enjoy into the game. Alternatively you can put your ideas forward as suggestions on our forums and have your voice heard and see your ideas implemented if fellow players support you.

Ardour Forums:

We would like the forums to be active with people posting their activities whether it be banter ranging from the PVM section to our clan discussion to even the market place, we want you to notice an uncontrollable amount of topics and giveaways which no other RSPS can provide you. Here at Ardour we would like to be successful in the amount of members we have and will plan to still be growing at a rapid and uncontrollable pace. We also have a dedicated black market section, you will eventually be able to buy Ardour Prem which will simply give you the status and the money earned will all go into the server.

Features:

  • Flawless skills
  • Perfect Duel Arena
  • Many Minigames perfected
  • Clue scrolls implemented
  • Friendly Staff and Active staff from all over the world
  • Hundreds of PVM and PVP opportunities with countless rewards
  • Every city functioning
  • Perfect PKing with flawless switching and perfect hybriding
  • Extremely stable
  • Every working special attack you can think of from Runescape in 2006.

We will be a 100% replica of Runescape as it was in 2006. Please join us in our growing community.

[size=18pt]If you think you have the skills required to help program ardour, please add my skype[/size]: [size=24pt]mrzeus6[/size]



Read full topic
item.source: Ardour- a 100% replica of RuneScape in 2006
